message: Some mysterious power prevents you from proceeding further. You think you hear some very silent whispering coming out of the cave entrance like there was a ritual.

replies.text: I'm looking for a valuable book, Elythara's chants. I know you bandits stole it!
Um, just strolling around. *Player slowly goes back.*

message: What are you doing here?! Get lost kid!
Then you're going to die, kid! You will never get this book!
Edwin shouts: Go away there: What's down here is none of your business!
A powerful magical force that you have never encountered before pushes you back when you try to pass the cave entrance.
As you go one step further you get hurt badly by some dark magic and stumble back. This is definitely no way to pass.
